channel.title: Contemporary revolution in Latin America
channel.description:
A documentary series on problems facing Latin America, including panel discussions at program conclusion. The series is hosted by Erwin Canham, editor at the Christian Science Monitor.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Social welfare and population explosion
item.description: This program looks at the quality of life and the rapidly growing population in Latin America.
item.dc:creator: Canham, Erwin D. (Erwin Dain), 1904-1982
item.dc:subject: Latin America--Politics and government--20th century.

item.title: Latin American Economy, part 1
item.description: This program, the first of two parts, focuses on Latin America's struggle for economic independence.
item.dc:creator: Canham, Erwin D. (Erwin Dain), 1904-1982
item.dc:subject: Latin America--Politics and government--20th century.

item.title: Education in Latin America
item.description: This program explores the challenges facing educators in Latin America.
item.dc:creator: Canham, Erwin D. (Erwin Dain), 1904-1982
item.dc:subject: Latin America--Politics and government--20th century.

item.title: Cultures in conflict
item.description: This program explores the conflict between the Indian and European cultures that exist in Latin America.
item.dc:creator: Canham, Erwin D. (Erwin Dain), 1904-1982
item.dc:subject: Latin America--Politics and government--20th century.

item.title: Agrarian revolution
item.description: This program discusses issues of land and agriculture in Latin America.
item.dc:creator: Canham, Erwin D. (Erwin Dain), 1904-1982
item.dc:subject: Latin America--Politics and government--20th century.

item.title: Struggle for democracy
item.description: This program discusses the challenges facing the developing democracies in Latin America.
item.dc:creator: Canham, Erwin D. (Erwin Dain), 1904-1982
item.dc:subject: Latin America--Politics and government--20th century.

item.title: United States and Latin America, part 2
item.description: This program, the second of two parts, explores the complicated relationship between the United States and Latin America.
item.dc:creator: Canham, Erwin D. (Erwin Dain), 1904-1982
item.dc:subject: United States-Latin American relations

item.title: Information barrier
item.description: This program examines if the North American press provides enough coverage of Latin American affairs and if the United States makes enough of an effort to communicate directly to Latin America.
item.dc:creator: Canham, Erwin D. (Erwin Dain), 1904-1982
item.dc:subject: Latin America--Politics and government--20th century.

item.title: United States and Latin America, part 1
item.description: This program, the first of two parts, explores the complicated relationship between the United States and Latin America.
item.dc:creator: Canham, Erwin D. (Erwin Dain), 1904-1982
item.dc:subject: United States-Latin American relations

item.title: Revolution of rising expectations
item.description: This program discusses "The Revolution of Rising Expectations" and how improving conditions in Latin America are spurring its citizens to demand improvements in government, education, and society in general.
item.dc:creator: Canham, Erwin D. (Erwin Dain), 1904-1982
item.dc:subject: Latin America--Social conditions--20th century.

item.title: Latin American Economy, part 2
item.description: This program, the second of two parts, focuses on Latin America's struggle for economic independence.
item.dc:creator: Canham, Erwin D. (Erwin Dain), 1904-1982
item.dc:subject: Latin America--Politics and government--20th century.
